artist: Artist: Hashiguchi Goyō (self-published); Carver: Takano Shichinosuke; Printer: Somekawa Kanzō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: woman in red kimono with green trim; applying makeup to PL shoulder with PR hand; mirror held in PL hand
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica and embossing
text: Goyō catches his model Nakatani Tsuru 中谷つる during her make-up while she is putting white powder on her shoulders with the help of a small mirror.
title: Woman Applying Powder
